issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Script operator cannot run in minillap and so was removed from the minillap test suite. But tez supports script + transform. Add the removed tests back to minitez test suite.
fields.summary: Add back the script + transform tests to minitez

comments.body:
